attributes.action: limit the number of immigrants (EEA Nationals and non-EEA nationals) to 15,000 per year and to implement a strict points system for all immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There should be a limit on the number of EEA (European Economic Area) and non-EEA Nationals into the UK of 15,000 per annum and each of those 15,000 should have to meet a stringent points criteria. This will make sure that we only allow immigrants who can contribute to our economy, reduce the strain on local councils and public services, reduce the housing shortage, reduce social segregation, reduce the burden on infrastructure on roads and therefore taxes. This not a matter of racism, we are a small island and we cannot hold anymore people. So we must look after the people that are here now and for the future, that is both immigrants and British Citizens.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
